item.title: Tesla board chair calls debate over Elon Musk’s $1T pay package ‘a little bit weird’
item.description: Tesla's board chair is defending a proposed 10-year, $1 trillion compensation package for CEO Elon Musk.

item.title: Pilot union urges FAA to reject Rainmaker’s drone cloud-seeding plan
item.description: Rainmaker wants to use flares to seed clouds — the airline pilots' union says it won't be safe.

item.title: California lawmakers pass AI safety bill SB 53 — but Newsom could still veto
item.description: The state's landmark safety bill sets new transparency requirements for large AI companies.

item.title: xAI reportedly lays off 500 workers from data annotation team
item.description: Elon Musk's AI startup says it's shifting focus from generalist AI tutors to specialists.

item.title: Here’s the tech powering ICE’s deportation crackdown
item.description: From phone spyware and facial recognition to forensic phone hacking technology to databases and more, this tech powers Trump's deportation machine.
